name: Holo Madness
description:
In this little game, which was made for the Wowie Jam 3.0, you are a robot and have to escape from an evil laboratory without dying. Everytime you die you get reincarnated into another body and know the locations of the traps that killed you. They appear as holograms.

Controlls

  • A and D - Move
  • Space - Jump
